Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to use of revenues from tolls collected on the Verrazzano-Narrows bridge
Summary: Directs revenues from tolls collected on the Verrazzano-Narrows bridge to be applied to expansion of bus rapid transit and high-occupancy vehicle lanes in the borough of Staten Island.
LawCode: Amd ยง553-j, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to use of revenues from tolls collected on the Verrazzano-Narrows bridge
